cause.description:
We are a tightly knit family of multicultural women from a multitude of backgrounds that share the common vision of a diverse and tolerant global society.
Founded in 1994 at the University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign, Delta Xi Phi Multicultural Sorority Inc. is a pioneering force in the multicultural greek realm with chapters in Illinois, California, Mississippi, Wisconsin, Massachusetts, Alabama, Maryland, Michigan, Ohio, Missouri, New York, New Hampshire and Indiana.
1. Advance Women through Higher Education
2. Increase Multicultural Awareness
3. Community Service
4. Sisterhood
5. Friendship
cause.mission: Advance Women through Higher Education, Increase Multicultural Awareness, Provide Service to our Communities, share in Sisterhood with each oher and extend Friendship to all people.
cause.name: Delta Xi Phi Multicultural Sorority, Inc.
